content: puppy the glasses holder crochet pattern i want to thank you so much for purchasing my pattern nice to meet you my name is victoria i`m the designer of this pattern i`ll be glad to see your finished toy made with my pattern please mark me ot your photoson instagram @crochet nustyua let`s start smooth loops and happy crocheting 2 crochet pattern by victoriya shevchuk size of ready toy is about 16x9 cm/ 6x4 inches size of the toys depended from yarn thickness hook thickness or solidity of crocheting materials  yarn yarnart jeans 50g/160m 55% cotton/45% pac fine 2 i use 2 thread togeter main colour beige #07 and additional white #01  crotchet hook 3 5 mm  beads 8 mm with felt or eyes 12-15 mm  fiberfill abbreviations and stitches used magic_ring magic_ring chain chain stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease decrease single_crochet 2 stitches together increase increase 2sc in 1 chain double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet-increase crochet 2ddc at 1 chain blo crochet through blo loops only slip_stitch slip stich xn repeat n-time round round i use crocheting in a spiral way for this toy how to do invisible decrease tip use marker for beginning of new round 3 main part crochet oval with main yarn round 1 17 chain from 2nd chain 15 single_crochet 3sc in 1 chain on other side 14 single_crochet 1 increase total 34 round 2 1 increase 14 single_crochet 3 increase 14 single_crochet 2 increase 40 round 3 1 single_crochet 1 increase 14 single_crochet 1 single_crochet 1 increase x3 14 single_crochet 1 single_crochet 1 increase x2 46 round 4 2 single_crochet 1 increase 14 single_crochet 2 single_crochet 1 increase x3 14 single_crochet 2 single_crochet 1 increase x2 52 round 5 3 single_crochet 1 increase 14 single_crochet 3 single_crochet 1 increase x3 14 single_crochet 3 single_crochet 1 increase x2 58 round 6 4 single_crochet 1 increase 14 single_crochet 4 single_crochet 1 increase x3 14 single_crochet 4 single_crochet 1 increase x2 64 round 7 5 single_crochet 1 increase 14 single_crochet 5 single_crochet 1 increase x3 14 single_crochet 5 single_crochet 1 increase x2 70 you can crochet more or less rounds to get such size as you want round 8 blo 70 single_crochet round 9-11 3 rounds 70 single_crochet cut yarn and hide tail 4 muzzle crochet muzzle with white yarn round 1 5 chain from 2nd chain - 3 single_crochet 3sc in 1 chain on other side 2 single_crochet 1 increase total 10 round 2 1 increase 3 single_crochet 3 increase 2 single_crochet 2 increase 16 round 3-4 2 rounds 16 single_crochet cut yarn and hide tail ears make 2 crochet ears with main yarn round 1 4 chain 10 double_crochet at 1st chain 1 slip_stitch at lifting chains round 2 3 chain 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet-increase x5 1 slip_stitch at lifting chains round 3-4 2 rounds 3 chain 15 double_crochet 1 slip_stitch at lifting chains round 5 3 chain 1 double_crochet 2 double_crochet crochet together x5 1 slip_stitch at lifting chains round 6 3 chain
